attributes.action: Make University Education (during the pandemic) cheaper or free!
attributes.additional_details: Paying the full 9k for not even a standard university experience is unethical and not fair. Many of us applied for university before the pandemic with hopes and high expectations that we would be able to do what people in university were able to do before the pandemic.
attributes.background: We all know covid has impacted everyone however we did not expect that it would effect our education to this point. Having to study a degree online has effected me from feeling immersed and fully understanding my subject. To the point it has been a hassle getting in touch with lectures.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911
